sentence.Network_en: I took my first extra-mural course in 1948 in Coventry, even though I was working in Birmingham.
sentence.Network_cn: 1948年我在考文垂第一次上校外课，虽然当时我在伯明翰工作。

sentence.Network_en: The campus is linked by regular bus services to Coventry.

sentence.Network_en: Men who refused to strike were sent to Coventry by their colleagues.

entry.def: If people send you to Coventry, they avoid speaking to you whenever they meet you, as a way of punishing you for something that you have done.

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being banished or ostracized (excluded from society by general consent);
